short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An enhancement extension for the RBA and its forum.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: RBA Verbesserungsgarnitur (RBAVG) is an enhancement extension for the german Battle Rap platform RBA and its forum. RBAVG provides several fixes and enhancements, including web audio players, keyboard navigation and design fixes.
